verbose_text: The Polish Society of Paediatric Oncology and Haematology recommends the initiation of HBV vaccinations in patients 6-12 months both after allo- and auto-HCT, concurrently with vaccinations against diphtheria (with an increased amount of the diphtheria antigen), tetanus, pertussis (acellular vaccine), meningococci and human papillomavirus (regardless of gender), in patients without GVHD symptoms.
